description: Source code for a React component called UploadPanel, which provides a drag-and-drop interface for uploading files, including handling selected files, mock upload action, and user interface controls.

methods.name: UploadPanel
methods.description: React functional component managing file uploads with drag-and-drop and file selection.

methods.name: onFilesSelected
methods.description: Handles file selection and filters files by specific extensions.

methods.name: onUpload
methods.description: Simulates uploading files by sending their metadata to an API endpoint.
